name: @bpmappr/shared-schemas
description: Shared BPMN JSON schemas and generated types for BPMappr

scripts.generate:ts: json2ts -i src/bpmn_json.schema.json -o src/types.ts --bannerComment '/* Auto-generated from bpmn_json.schema.json - DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY */'
scripts.generate: pnpm run generate:ts && pnpm run generate:py
